channel.title: Need help with gnome course agility

item.title: Need help with gnome course agility
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

So I added a ticket exchange to my server, so I have to make that people need to complete the WHOLE gnome course before getting the tickets at the last object.

This doesnâ€™t work:

if(objectID == 4058 && (absX == 2484 && absY == 3430 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval || absX == 2487 && absY == 3430 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval)){ addSkillXP(2000, 16); addItem(2996, 1); actionInterval = 2500; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); WalkTimer(0,7); setAnimation(746); }

Any one an idea how to fix this?
base is delta
